name: Google Calendar Redesigned (Dark Mode)
description:
A dark style for Google Calendar from the creators of the original "Google Redesigned" extension.

To report issue please visit: https://github.com/EvHaus/google-redesigned

NOTE: This style does not support the right-side Keep/Reminders sidebar.
obsoletion_message: This style is now available via http://www.globexdesigns.com/products/gr
additional_info: For a list of changes and updates visit: https://github.com/EvHaus/google-redesigned/commits/master

discussions.name: Header Is Still White; Otherwise fantastic!!!
dark, but preserves contrast: love it
